title: Sri Lanka imposes near 4 hour power cut on Monday
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Ceylon Electricity Board imposed up to three hour and 45 minute power cut for Monday (14), the Public Utilities Commission said.
Areas designated ABCDEFGHIJKL will face three hour and 45 minute power cut on the day while areas PQRSTUVW will suffer a three hour power cut.
The power cut schedule for March 13 can be downloaded here:  14-03-2022-Power-Interruption-Schedule-1
Sri Lanka is facing extended power cuts after money printing created forex shortages making it difficult to import fuel amid a seasonal dry period, which was worsened by a coal plant outage.
The crisis was worsened because the authorities denied the CEB of one to two hour power cuts to conserve hydro storage after the coal plant went down. (Colombo/March 14/2022)
